MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL61 postcode area of LlanfairPG, affecting properties in Ffordd Angharad and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00 Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:30AM 12th November 2020
